suite.name: IAC-8 Automatizado

kw.name: Abrir Navegador Y Navegar Al Simulador
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
Setup inicial del navegador

test.name: TC001 Simulacion Hipotecaria Metodo Frances

kw.name: Navegar Al Simulador
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
Navegar a la página del simulador

kw.name: Seleccionar Tipo De Credito
Select From List By Label
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=selcProduct' by label Hipotecario vivienda.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
Seleccionar tipo de crédito del dropdown

kw.name: Ingresar Valor De La Vivienda
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Ingresar valor de la vivienda (solo hipotecarios)

kw.name: Seleccionar Metodo Frances
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Seleccionar método de amortización francés

kw.name: Ejecutar Simulacion
kw.doc: Hacer clic en el botón simular y esperar resultados

kw.name: Obtener Cuota Mensual
kw.doc: Extraer valor de cuota mensual de los resultados

kw.name: Obtener Tasa De Interes
kw.doc: Extraer tasa de interés de los resultados

kw.name: Obtener Total A Pagar
kw.doc: Extraer total a pagar de los resultados

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot
kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.msg: ${opciones_consumo} = ['Selecciona tu plazo', '3 meses', '4 meses', '5 meses', '6 meses', '7 meses', '8 meses', '9 meses', '10 meses', '11 meses', '12 meses (1.0 años)', '18 meses (1.5 años)', '24 meses (2.0 años)', '30 me...
